author: Abel
title: Anteckning 1
text: Indicator of how the metric changed, rendered with an arrow below the metric. If delta is negative (int/float) or starts with a minus sign (str), the arrow points down and the text is red; else the arrow points up and the text is green.

author: David
title: Anteckning 2
text: If normal (default), the delta indicator is shown as described above. If inverse, it is red when positive and green when negative. This is useful when a negative change is considered good, e.g. if cost decreased.

author: Salomo
title: Anteckning 3
text: If normal (default), the delta indicator is shown as described above. If inverse, it is red when positive and green when negative. This is useful when a negative change is considered good, e.g. if cost decreased.
